summary:
This mod changes the Soul Siphon perk so that it absorbs more than just 5% of the victims soul.
Instead, it absorbs 25-50-75-100% based on the file you choose.
descriptionHtml:
Created by: airjp73

This mod changes the Soul Siphon perk so that it absorbs more than just 5% of the victims soul.
Instead, it absorbs 10-25-50-75-100% based on the file you choose.


Installation:
Open the zip.
Choose one of the 5 esp files and put it in your Skyrim/Data folder.
The numbers at the end of each file name represent the % of soul that\'s absorbed.


Conflicts:
This mod may conflict with any mod that makes changes to this perk.
author: airjp73

files.name: More Useful Soul Siphon Old Version
files.fileName: More Useful Soul Siphon Old Version-17898.zip
